entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , St. Thomas
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:55 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -13.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 12:43 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

Temperature: -13.1°C

Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -15.5°C
Wind: WSW 41 km/h gust 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 100. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 100. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
